      • MWE_UPPER_INITIAL_PATTERN

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern MWE_UPPER_INITIAL_PATTERN
        A RegEx pattern used to identify multi-word expressions containing only words that start with a capital letter.

      • INITIALS_PATTERN

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern INITIALS_PATTERN
        Pattern used to identify abbreviations based on initials (e.g. "BT" or "B.T.").

      • UPPER_INITIAL_PATTERN

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern UPPER_INITIAL_PATTERN
        A word that starts with an upper case letter. This is a sub-pattern of MWE_UPPER_INITIAL_PATTERN.

      • partsForMwe

        public static final java.lang.String[] partsForMwe(java.lang.String input)
        Given a multi-word expression, this method splits it at whitespace and returns its constituent parts.
        Parameters:
        input - the String containing the multi-word expression.
        Returns:
        the array of parts, in the same order as they occurred in the input string.
